name: Viridian Zealot Avatar
originalText: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Search your library for a card with the same name as the sacrificed creature, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Search your library for a card with the same name as the sacrificed creature, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
